alert.note: Alert for Borden; Mitchell; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mitchell, Scurry, southeastern Borden and northeastern Howard Counties through 230 PM CST... At 129 PM CST, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Snyder, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public reported pea sized hail in Snyder. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Snyder, Colorado City, Loraine, Colorado City Airport, J B Thomas Reservoir, Inadale, Hermleigh, Randalls Corner, Winston Field, Cuthbert, Knapp, Buford, Dunn and Ira. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 216 and 228. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
